sentence: Colgate-Palmolive Company ( CL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on October 21, 2015.
A cash dividend payment of $0.38 per share is scheduled to be paid on November 16, 2015.
Shareholders who purchased CL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 3rd quarter that CL has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $67.25, the dividend yield is 2.26%.
The previous trading day's last sale of CL was $67.25, representing a -6.02% decrease from the 52 week high of $71.56 and a 32.28% increase over the 52 week low of $50.84.
CL is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
CL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $2.49.
Zacks Investment Research reports CL's forecasted earnings growth in 2015 as -3.28%, compared to an industry average of 6.7%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the CL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
